MemberSignature.Value: public IsoChunkLargeOffsetBox (TagLib.Mpeg4.BoxHeader header, TagLib.Mpeg4.File file, TagLib.Mpeg4.Box handler);

Docs.param: A containing the header for the new instance.
A containing the handler that applies to the new instance.
Docs.summary: Constructs and initializes a new instance of for a specified header by reading from a file.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Overwrite (TagLib.Mpeg4.File file, long size_difference, long after);

Docs.param: A specifying the size change that occured.
A specifying the seek position after which changes should be applied.
Docs.summary: Overwrites the version of the current instance on the disk with new offset values due to file change.
Docs.remarks: If an offset contains a position less than the value in no change will be made to it.

MemberSignature.Value: public TagLib.ByteVector Render (long size_difference, long after);

Docs.param: A specifying the size change that occured.
A specifying the seek position after which changes should be applied.
Docs.summary: Renders the current instance as a ChunkLargeOffsetBox applying a size change in the file.
Docs.returns: A rendered version of the current instance.
Docs.remarks: If an offset contains a position less than the value in no change will be made to it.

Docs.summary: Gets the offsets stored in the current instance.
This class provides access to ISO/IEC 14496-12 ChunkLargeOffsetBoxes.
